body.p: Gov Bramblett a Judgement was recovered against T T Brooks upon a forfeited Bail bond at this Term of the Rockcastle Circuit Court for two hundred and fifty dollars he was surety for one J J Ely who has left the country it was for shooting at one Jack Adams without wounding I am satisfied that the shooting was done under at least some provocation and T T Brooks is poore and inpeled has a family depending upon him for a support Pleas remit the fine
I concur in the above Statement and join in the prayer

Rockcastle Cir Ct
vs
T. T. Brooks
forfeiture
Remit except fees & costs
Tho E Bramlette
$250
26th Apl/64
